title: IMathPoint.IMultiplyTransform
description: Multiplies a math point with a math transform; the point is rotated, scaled, and then translated.

parameters.name: TransformObjIn
parameters.description: Math transform by which to multiply this math point

returns: Newly created translated math point or null if the operation fails
